ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
bookid = baseUrl.match(/(\d+)/)[1];
sourceinfo = source.getLoginInfoMap();
sourceinfo['书籍ID'] = bookid;
if (bookid) {
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(sourceinfo));
	}
$ = _ => java.getString(_);
img = $('[property$=image]@content').includes('alicesw.org') ? $('[property$=image]@content') : "https://alicesw.org" + $('[property$=image]@content');
list = {
	               "ID": bookid,
                "img": img,
                "name": $('[property$=book_name]@content'),
                "author": $('[property$=author]@content'),
                "info": $('[property$=description]@content'),
                "url": "legado://import/addToBookshelf?src="+baseUrl
            }
source.put("list",JSON.stringify(list));
} catch(err) {
	java.log("登录UI未初始化保存数据："+err);
	}
src;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = source.key
//处理强制登录
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//自动处理验证
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("滑动验证")) {
        let headers = {
            "User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 9) Mobile Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("验证Cookie：" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("检测到验证,尝试自动处理……");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('#chapterContent@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "自动验证失败，请重试!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('#chapterContent@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//处理重新获取文本时可能会出现的错误。
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`未获取到文本，正在重试...（当前第${retryCount}次重试）`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "重试三次仍然未获取到文本，请检查网络状况。"
}
result;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x=v[2]
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}`

try {
    const response = java.ajax(`{{getUrl()}}api/novel/app/novel/comments?novelId=@get:{bid}&sortType=1&page=${x}&rows=5`);
    const jsonData = JSON.parse(response);
    const logOutput = jsonData.data.map(comment => {
        const cleanNickName = comment.updateTime.replace(/T/g,'  ').replace(/\..*/g, '');
        // 根据分数生成星星显示
        const generateStars = (score) => {
            let starCount = Math.min(Math.floor(score / 2), 5);
            let stars = '';
            for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
                stars += i < starCount? '★' : '☆';
            }
            return stars;
        };
        const starDisplay = generateStars(comment.score);
        return `
  [${cleanNickName}]  ${comment.createTimeFormat}
⛄【${comment.nickName}】:👍🏻${comment.score} ${starDisplay}
 ${comment.content}
 \n­
 
`;
    }).join('\n');
    //java.log(logOutput);
} catch (error) {
    const errorLog = {
        [SyntaxError.name]: '数据解析失败: ',
        default: 'AJAX请求失败: '
    }[error.name || 'default'] + error.message;
    java.log(errorLog);
}
info = ` 
📖 书名：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}
👤 作者：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}
📜 篇幅：{{@@class.props_box@tag.ul@li.1@text}}
🔖 标签：{{@@class.tag_box@li[0:-3]@a@text##\n}}
🗿 肉量：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.0@text}}
✏  评分：{{@@class.score_box@span@text}}
🕰 最新：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}
👁 观看：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.2@text}}
❤️ 收藏：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@class.ellipsis@text##小说简介：}}`;
intro=info+`\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新\n­${logOutput}`
info=logOutput?intro:info
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	name=`{{book.name}}`
		author=`{{book.author}}`
		kind=`{{book.kind}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=` 
📖 书名：{{book.name}}
👤 作者：{{book.author}}
🏷 简介：{{book.intro}}`;

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
		name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.keywords}}`
		kind=`{{$..tags}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
   name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.authors}}`
		kind=`{{java.getString('.finished')==1?"完结":"连载"}},{{$..categories}}`
		word=``
		last=`{{$..latestUpdate}}`
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
}
data = {
    name: name,
    author: author,
    kind: kind,
    word:word,
    last: last,
    info: info
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
	book.type = 8;
 //java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾'); 
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 //java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾'); 
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    //java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({

    });
 data

searchUrl:
<js>
 v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
let url = `${getUrl()}`;
let uri=`data:;base64,辞晨,{"type":""}`;
try {
	if (x == 0){
	url +=	`api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword=${key}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
				}else if (x == 1) {
url +=	`api/comic/app/comic/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
     }else if (x == 2 ) {
url +=	`api/video/app/video/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
	   	}else if (x == 3 ) {
url +=	`api/audio/app/audio/search?category=&keyword={{encodeURIComponent(key)}}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=42`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
}
let code = ss.statusCode();
if (code==302||code==301) {
	uri=ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
	cache.put('urlss', ss.body());
		}else if (code == 502) {
		java.toast('\n'+'👻ip被拉黑了👻')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('💔访问出错💔')
		java.toast('\n💔访问出错，请换接口💔')
	}
	uri;
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = getUrl().replace(/\/$/,'')
//java.log(url)
//处理强制登录
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//自动处理验证
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("滑动验证")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("验证Cookie：" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("检测到验证,尝试自动处理……");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('.read-content@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "自动验证失败，请重试!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

<js>
var sid = java.get('sid');
let i = String(book.bookUrl).includes('https:/');
if (i) { sid = String(book.bookUrl).match(/\d{3,}$/);}

cache.deleteMemory('pxcjj'); //仅通过正文打开详情，防错
if (sid == '🇨🇳') {
	let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap();
	let bkn = String(book.name);
	let id = java.hexDecodeToString(result).match(/\d+$/)[0];
	Info['书名'] = '';
	cache.put('pxsid','');
	Info['章节'] = bkn;
	cache.put('pxid',id);
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
	let length = leng(bkn);	
book.intro = (source.get('bq')==1?String(java.get('tags')).replace(/, /g,' #').replace('[','#').replace(']','\n\n'):'') + (length>18?('《'+book.name+'》\n'):'') + java.get('jianjie');
	rr='1';
	}

else {
let url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v2/novel/series?series_id=' + sid;
//修正bookurl
book.bookUrl = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(url)},{'type':''}`;

try {

jg = java.connect(gethd(url));
rr = jg.body();
if (jg.code() == 400) {
	source.login();
	Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(500);
	rr = java.ajax(gethd(url));
	}

} catch(err) {
	rr={};
	java.toast('详情页链接加载失败'+sid);
	}

//设置解析结果
java.setContent(rr);


//更新更新时间
try {
let tm = java.getString('$.novel_series_latest_novel.create_date');
let d = new Date(tm);
d = java.timeFormatUTC(d,'yy/MM/dd',8*60*60*1000);
book.kind = String(book.kind).replace(/\d+\/\d+\/\d+|$/,d).replace('null','');
} catch(err) {java.toast('详情页内容错误');}

//获取书名并净化
let bkn = String(java.getString('$.novel_series_detail.title')).replace(/^《(.+)》$/,'$1');
book.name = bkn.replace(/[(（].{0,9}((?:仙侠|纯爱|后宫|萝莉).?){3,}.{0,9}[)）](?=\s*[一-ꀀ])/,'');

//java.log('┌获取书名\n[99:99.999] └'+book.name);

//获取书名失败
if (book.name == '') {
	//效果，unicode转字符
	// let ee = JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(rr) );
	let txte = java.getString('$..user_message',rr);
	//弹出提示，sid相应序列不存在
	java.longToast('\n未获取到书名\n'+txte);
	} else {
	
	//放入书名
	let Info=source.getLoginInfoMap();
	Info['书名'] = book.name;
	cache.put('pxsid',sid);
	Info['章节'] = '';
	cache.put('pxid','');
	source.putLoginInfo(JSON.stringify(Info));
	
	//同名共存
	if (source.get('gc') == 1) book.name='📘'+book.name;
	}

//补充封面链接
if (book.coverUrl == null) {
	let img = java.getString('$.novel_series_latest_novel.image_urls.large');
	book.coverUrl = gethdi(img);
		
//java.log('┌获取封面\n[99:99.999] └'+book.coverUrl);
}

//计算书名长度
let length = leng(String(book.name));
//大于18个全角字符
if (length > 18) length= '《'+String(book.name).replace(/^📘/,'')+'》\n';
else length = '';


let jianjie = java.getString('$.novel_series_detail.caption');


book.intro = (source.get('bq')==1?String(java.get('tags')).replace(/, /g,' #').replace('[','#').replace(']','\n\n'):'') + length + java.get('jianjie');
java.put('jianjie',jianjie);
java.put('bookr',rr);
}
//java.put('i',0);

rr
</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
if (page == 1) {
cache.putMemory('pxpage',page);
		if (/^\u200b/.test(key)) {
			let uid = cache.getFromMemory('pxuid');
			if (uid=='') java.longToast('\n请刷新书籍');
			else url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/user/novels?filter=for_android&user_id=' + uid;}
		else if (key.startsWith('作者@')) {
			let uid = key.slice(3);
			if (!/^\d{3,}$/.test(uid)) java.longToast('\n请输入正确的id');
			else url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/user/novels?filter=for_android&user_id='+uid;	}
		else if (/\d{5,}$/.test(key) ) {
			let sid = key.match(/\d+$/)[0];
			java.put('sid',sid);
			if (key.startsWith('作者')) java.longToast('\n请输入正确的搜索格式');
			else url = `data:;base64,${java.base64Encode(sid)},{'type':''}`;}
		else if (key.startsWith('正文@')) {
			url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/search/novel?filter=for_android&merge_plain_keyword_results=true&sort=date_desc&search_target=text&word='+key.slice(3);}
		else { url = 'https://app-api.pixiv.net/v1/search/novel?filter=for_android&merge_plain_keyword_results=true&word='+key;}
source.put('nurls','http://127.0.0.1'); //重置储存的下一页

} else {url = source.get('nurls');}
gethd(url)
</js>
